definitions.definition: The claw of a predatory animal or bird. [from 13th c.]
( by extension ) A grip , especially one seen as rapacious or evil . [from 16th c.]
A device to interrupt power transmission , commonly used to separate the engine and gearbox in a car. [from 19th c.]
The pedal in a car that disengages power and torque transmission from the engine (through the drivetrain ) to the drive wheels.
Any device for gripping an object, as at the end of a chain or tackle.
A fastener that attaches to the back of a tack pin to secure an accessory to clothing. ( See Clutch (pin fastener) . )
A small handbag or purse with no straps or handle .
( US ) An important or critical situation.

main_definition: The claw of a predatory animal or bird. [from 13th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A grip , especially one seen as rapacious or evil . [from 16th c.]
A device to interrupt power transmission , commonly used to separate the engine and gearbox in a car. [from 19th c.]
The pedal in a car that disengages power and torque transmission from the engine (through the drivetrain ) to the drive wheels.
Any device for gripping an object, as at the end of a chain or tackle.
A fastener that attaches to the back of a tack pin to secure an accessory to clothing. ( See Clutch (pin fastener) . )
A small handbag or purse with no straps or handle .
( US ) An important or critical situation.

definitions.definition: A brood of chickens or a sitting of eggs ; a sitting .
A group or bunch (of people or things).

main_definition: A brood of chickens or a sitting of eggs ; a sitting . [from 18th c.]
secondary_definitions: A group or bunch (of people or things). [from 20th c.]
